meanings.definition: The state or quality of being above or beyond normal.
meanings.sent1: Her supernormality in academics earned her a scholarship.
meanings.sent2: His supernormality in sports made him stand out among his peers.
meanings.sent3: The cat's supernormality in catching mice amazed the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The supernormality of her memory was compared to that of a computer.
meanings.sent5: The supernormality of the superhero's strength was unmatched by any villain.

meanings.definition: The ability to exceed or go beyond what is considered normal or average.
meanings.sent1: The team's supernormality in teamwork led them to victory.
meanings.sent2: His supernormality in problem-solving made him the go-to person in the office.
meanings.sent3: The dog's supernormality in fetching sticks entertained the children for hours.
meanings.sent4: The supernormality of her kindness touched everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The supernormality of the artist's talent left the audience in awe.
